channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Cooler December weather expected to boost sales at Home Depot, Lowe’s and more
Here’s what’s worth streaming on Netflix, Max, Disney+ and more in January 2025
FBI warns crime gangs are stalking NFL and NBA stars on social media—Travis Kelce and Luka Doncic among burglarized
item.description: Organized theft groups from South America use publicly available information and social media to identify athletes' habits and track their comings and...

item.title: Treasury Department says a China state-sponsored cyberattack gained access to workstations and documents
item.description: The incident happened earlier this month, when a third-party cybersecurity service provider was compromised.

item.title: California will require home insurers to expand coverage in wildfire-prone areas after top carriers stopped offering new policies
item.description: In exchange for increasing coverage, insurers will be able to consider climate change when setting their prices.

item.title: American Airlines’ stock could gain as much as 38%, say analysts in new upgrade
Americans are increasingly falling behind on their credit card bills, flashing a warning sign for the economy
item.description: The amount of credit card debt written off through the first three quarters of 2024 reached $45.7 billion, up 46% from the same period a year ago.

item.title: Here's which markets and offices are open on New Year’s Eve and New Year’s Day
U.S. stocks close lower again, further dimming hopes for 'Santa Claus rally'
Jet carrying Gonzaga basketball team nearly collides with Delta plane at LAX—audio captures frantic ‘stop, stop, stop’ from air traffic control
item.description: A plane operated by Key Lime Air nearly collided with a Delta aircraft that was taking off around 4:30 p.m. No one was injured.
